member.name: FontFamily.Clone
member.summary: The FontFamily.Clone method creates a new FontFamily object based on this FontFamily object.
member.returns: This method returns a pointer to the new FontFamily object.

member.name: FontFamily.FontFamily
member.summary: Creates a FontFamily.FontFamily object based on a specified font family.
member.param: Name of the font family. For example, Arial.ttf is the name of the Arial font family.

Optional. Pointer to aFontCollection object that specifies the collection that the font family belongs to. IfFontCollection is NULL, this font family is not part of a collection. The default value is NULL.

member.name: FontFamily.GenericMonospace
member.summary: The FontFamily.GenericMonospace method gets a FontFamily object that specifies a generic monospace typeface.
member.returns: This method returns a pointer to a FontFamily object that specifies a generic monospace typeface.

member.name: FontFamily.GenericSansSerif
member.summary: The FontFamily.GenericSansSerif method gets a FontFamily object that specifies a generic sans serif typeface.
member.returns: This method returns a pointer to a FontFamily object that specifies a generic sans serif typeface.

member.name: FontFamily.GenericSerif
member.summary: The FontFamily.GenericSerif method gets aFontFamily object that represents a generic serif typeface.
member.returns: This method returns a pointer to a FontFamily object that represents a generic serif typeface.

member.name: FontFamily.GetCellAscent
member.summary: The FontFamily.GetCellAscent method gets the cell ascent, in design units, of this font family for the specified style or style combination.
member.param: Integer that specifies the style of the typeface. This value must be an element of the enumeration or the result of a bitwise OR applied to two or more of these elements. For example, FontStyleBold | FontStyleUnderline | FontStyleStrikeout specifies a combination of the three styles.
member.returns: This method returns the cell ascent, in design units, of this font family for the specified style or style combination.

member.name: FontFamily.GetCellDescent
member.summary: The FontFamily.GetCellDescent method gets the cell descent, in design units, of this font family for the specified style or style combination.
member.param: Integer that specifies the style of the typeface. This value must be an element of the enumeration or the result of a bitwise OR applied to two or more of these elements. For example, FontStyleBold | FontStyleUnderline | FontStyleStrikeout specifies a combination of the three styles.
member.returns: This method returns the cell descent, in design units, of this font family for the specified style or style combination.

member.name: FontFamily.GetEmHeight
member.summary: The FontFamily.GetEmHeight method gets the size (commonly called em size or em height), in design units, of this font family.
member.param: Integer that specifies the style of the typeface. This value must be an element of the enumeration or the result of a bitwise OR applied to two or more of these elements. For example, FontStyleBold | FontStyleUnderline | FontStyleStrikeout specifies a combination of the three styles.
member.returns: This method returns the size, in design units, of this font family.

member.name: FontFamily.GetFamilyName
member.summary: The FontFamily.GetFamilyName method gets the name of this font family.
member.param: Optional. Sixteen-bit value that specifies the language to use. The default value is LANG_NEUTRAL, which is the user's default language.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: FontFamily.GetLastStatus
member.summary: The FontFamily.GetLastStatus method returns a value that indicates the nature of this FontFamily object's most recent method failure.

returns.para: The FontFamily.GetLastStatus method returns an element of the enumeration.
If no methods invoked on this FontFamily object have failed since the previous call to FontFamily.GetLastStatus, then FontFamily.GetLastStatus returns Ok.

If at least one method invoked on this FontFamily object has failed since the previous call to FontFamily.GetLastStatus, then FontFamily.GetLastStatus returns a value that indicates the nature of the most recent failure.

member.name: FontFamily.GetLineSpacing
member.summary: The FontFamily.GetLineSpacing method gets the line spacing, in design units, of this font family for the specified style or style combination. The line spacing is the vertical distance between the base lines of two consecutive lines of text.
member.param: Integer that specifies the style of the typeface. This value must be an element of the enumeration or the result of a bitwise OR applied to two or more of these elements. For example, FontStyleBold | FontStyleUnderline | FontStyleStrikeout specifies a combination of the three styles.
member.returns: This method returns the line spacing of this font family.

member.name: FontFamily.IsAvailable
member.summary: The FontFamily.IsAvailable method determines whether this FontFamily object was created successfully.
member.returns: If this FontFamily object was created successfully, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE.

member.name: FontFamily.IsStyleAvailable
member.summary: The FontFamily.IsStyleAvailable method determines whether the specified style is available for this font family.
member.param: Integer that specifies the style of the typeface. This value must be an element of the enumeration or the result of a bitwise OR applied to two or more of these elements. For example, FontStyleBold | FontStyleUnderline | FontStyleStrikeout specifies a combination of the three styles.
member.returns: If the style or combination of styles is available, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE.
